conversation.content: Hi there! You know the Mona Lisa?
Yes, I know the Mona Lisa.
It is in the Louvre Museum.
Right! In which city is the Louvre Museum?
It's a famous painting. Have you seen it?
That's okay! Maybe you can visit it one day. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
